reedsolomon 0.0.1
  • Reference

    Reed-Solomon Pixel-Level Algorithm for Remote Sensing Data Fusion

    reedsolomon_fusion.Rd

    Reed-Solomon Pixel-Level Algorithm for Remote Sensing Data Fusion

    reedsolomon_fusion(x, a, stretch = FALSE, ...)

    Arguments

    x

    SpatRaster

    a

    Maximum theoretical number of categories (integer values) in x

    stretch

    TRUE/FALSE Should all layers be stretch to the same range of values? It calls terra::stretch()

    ...

    Other parameters of terra::stretch() and terra::app()

    Value

    SpatRaster with just one layer

    References

    Werner, P. A. (2020). Application of the Reed-Solomon Algorithm as a Remote Sensing Data Fusion Tool for Land Use Studies. Algorithms, 13(8), 188. MDPI AG. Retrieved from http://dx.doi.org/10.3390/a13080188

    Examples

    library(terra)
#> terra 1.6.47
s1 = rast(system.file("ex/logo.tif", package = "terra"))
plot(s1)


r1 = reedsolomon_fusion(s1, a = 256)
plot(r1)


#s2 = s1 * 1.21
#r2 = reedsolomon_fusion(s2)
#s3 = s1 - 100
#r3 = reedsolomon_fusion(s3)
